text: Abrosovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Nagornoye Rural Settlement, Petushinsky District, Vladimir Oblast, Russia. The population was 18 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == The village is located 19 km north from Pokrov and 33 km north-west from Petushki. == References == Category:Rural localities in Vladimir Oblast
title: Abrosovo, Vladimir Oblast
